openwebui_variables.name: DOCLING_OCR_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description:
Specifies the OCR engine used by Docling.
  Supported values include: `tesseract` (default), `easyocr`, `ocrmac`, `rapidocr`, and `tesserocr`.

openwebui_variables.name: DOCLING_OCR_LANG
openwebui_variables.description:
Specifies the OCR language(s) to be used with the configured `DOCLING_OCR_ENGINE`.
  The format and available language codes depend on the selected OCR engine.

openwebui_variables.name: DOCLING_SERVER_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the URL for the Docling server. Requires Docling version 1.0.0 or later.
